entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
